mapper.select: select distinct rdate, tno, d,f from ( select S.TNO, S.SEATNO, S.ISSUE ,Sc.SCOUNT,rdate, sc.mno, (select count(*) from seat where issue=0) d,(select count(*) from SEAT)f from seat s, (select * from schedule) sc where mno = #{mno} and Sc.RDATE LIKE '%'||#{rdate}||'%' order by sc.rdate asc )
